Atlas is an upcoming American science fiction action thriller film directed by Brad Peyton and written by Leo Sardarian and Aron Eli Coleite.[2] The film stars Jennifer Lopez, Simu Liu, Sterling K. Brown, and Mark Strong.[3][4][1]
A co-production of Safehouse Pictures, ASAP Entertainment, Nuyorican Productions and Berlanti-Schechter Films, Atlas is scheduled to be released by Netflix on May 24, 2024.


Plot[edit]
Atlas Shepherd, a brilliant but misanthropic data analyst with a deep distrust of artificial intelligence, joins a mission to capture a renegade robot with whom she shares a mysterious past. When plans go awry, her only hope of saving the future of humanity from AI is to trust it.[5]

Cast[edit]
Jennifer Lopez as Atlas Shepherd[6]
Simu Liu
Sterling K. Brown
Mark Strong[7]
Abraham Popoola
Lana Parrilla
Production[edit]
The screenplay was originally written by Leo Sardarian, and Aron Eli Coleite performed rewrites. Simu Liu, Sterling K. Brown, and Abraham Popoola joined the cast in August 2022.[1] In September 2022, it was reported that Lana Parrilla has joined the cast.[8]
Principal photography began on August 26, 2022, in Los Angeles and New Zealand, and wrapped on November 26.[9]

Release[edit]
Atlas is scheduled to be released by Netflix on May 24, 2024.[10]
